api_token.title: API Token
api_token.description: Jira API Token. See the docs for more information on how to generate this key. API Token is used for Authorization to your account by BasicAuth.

domain.title: Domain
domain.description: The Domain for your Jira account, e.g. airbyteio.atlassian.net, airbyteio.jira.com, jira.your-domain.com

email.title: Email
email.description: The user email for your Jira account which you used to generate the API token. This field is used for Authorization to your account by BasicAuth.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: List of Jira project keys to replicate data for, or leave it empty if you want to replicate data for all projects.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which you want to replicate data from Jira, use the format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z. Note that this field only applies to certain streams, and only data generated on or after the start date will be replicated. Or leave it empty if you want to replicate all data. For more information, refer to the documentation.

expand_issue_changelog.title: Expand Issue Changelog
expand_issue_changelog.description: (DEPRECATED) Expand the changelog when replicating issues.

render_fields.title: Render Issue Fields
render_fields.description: (DEPRECATED) Render issue fields in HTML format in addition to Jira JSON-like format.

expand_issue_transition.title: Expand Issue Transitions
expand_issue_transition.description: (DEPRECATED) Expand the transitions when replicating issues.

issues_stream_expand_with.title: Expand Issues stream
issues_stream_expand_with.description: Select fields to Expand the `Issues` stream when replicating with:

lookback_window_minutes.title: Lookback window
lookback_window_minutes.description: When set to N, the connector will always refresh resources created within the past N minutes. By default, updated objects that are not newly created are not incrementally synced.

enable_experimental_streams.title: Enable Experimental Streams
enable_experimental_streams.description: Allow the use of experimental streams which rely on undocumented Jira API endpoints. See https://docs.airbyte.com/integrations/sources/jira#experimental-tables for more info.

num_workers.title: Number of concurrent workers
num_workers.description: The number of worker threads to use for the sync.
